Smite.NAME: Smite
Smite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is frail, deal 50% more.
Smite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is frail, deal twice as much.

EmpoweringForce.NAME: Empowering Force
EmpoweringForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Upgrade up to !M! card in your hand.
EmpoweringForce.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Upgrade up to !M! cards in your hand.

RecklessSmite.NAME: Reckless Smite
RecklessSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! vulnerable. NL If the enemy is frail, deal 50% more.
RecklessSmite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !M! vulnerable. NL If the enemy is frail, deal twice as much.

MercilessSmite.NAME: Merciless Smite
MercilessSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each Smite card in your hand. If the enemy is frail, deal 50% more
MercilessSmite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each Smite card in your hand. If the enemy is frail, deal twice as much

Decimate.NAME: Decimate
Decimate.DESCRIPTION: If you have !M!% HP or more, deal !D! damage.

PowerStrike.NAME: Power Strike
PowerStrike.DESCRIPTION: For each [R] you have, deal !M! damage.

WideSmite.NAME: Wide Smite
WideSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Each frail enemy is dealt 50% more.
WideSmite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Each frail enemy is dealt twice as much.

CombatDance.NAME: Combat Dance
CombatDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [R]. NL Lose 8HP.

ToweringCharge.NAME: Towering Charge
ToweringCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If, after playing this card, you have 2 or more MP, apply !M! Frail.

GracefulSiphon.NAME: Graceful Siphon
GracefulSiphon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Heal !M! HP. Exhaust.

ZealousSmite.NAME: Zealous Smite
ZealousSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is frail, deal 50% more, gain [R] and draw a card.
ZealousSmite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is frail, deal twice as much, gain [R] and draw a card.

TearSoul.NAME: Tear Soul
TearSoul.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Next turn, start with [R] [R] LESS.
TearSoul.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Next turn, start with [R] LESS.

BreakThrough.NAME: Break Through
BreakThrough.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable. Exhaust.

Uprising.NAME: Uprising
Uprising.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Return a card from your discard pile to your hand.

Chainer.NAME: Chainer
Chainer.DESCRIPTION: For each 10 HP you have, deal !M! Damage.

FuriousSmite.NAME: Furious Smite
FuriousSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! HP. NL If the enemy is frail, deal 50% more.
FuriousSmite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! HP. NL If the enemy is frail, deal twice as much.

AuraDischarge.NAME: Aura Discharge
AuraDischarge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies NL Heal !M! HP. Exhaust.

Desperation.NAME: Desperation
Desperation.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! HP. NL Apply 3 Vulnerable.

AbandonReason.NAME: Abandon Reason
AbandonReason.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each 10 points of HP you lost. Deal !D! damage.

Retaliate.NAME: Retaliate
Retaliate.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you lost life this turn. Deal !D! damage.

StrainingSmite.NAME: Straining Smite
StrainingSmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is frail, deal 50% more. NL Add a Burn to your hand.
StrainingSmite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is frail, deal twice as much. NL Add a Burn to your hand.

FinalGambit.NAME: Final Gambit
FinalGambit.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your HP. Your HP becomes 1.
FinalGambit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your HP. Lose 80% of your HP.

DangerousSmash.NAME: Dangerous Smash
DangerousSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have no energy in your pool, start next turn with [R] less.

Execution.NAME: Execution
Execution.DESCRIPTION: Remove an enemy's Weak and deal that much damage to them.

Tantrum.NAME: Tantrum
Tantrum.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the amount of times you lost HP this turn times !M!.

AlmightySmite.NAME: Almighty Smite
AlmightySmite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is frail, deal 50% more.
AlmightySmite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is frail, deal twice as much.

PowerStance.NAME: Power Stance
PowerStance.DESCRIPTION: For each [R] you have, gain !M! Block.

TakeAim.NAME: Take Aim
TakeAim.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. It costs 1 less this turn. Exhaust.
TakeAim.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. It costs 1 less this turn.

MightBracer.NAME: Might Bracer
MightBracer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Exhaust the top card of your deck

HolyFury.NAME: Holy Fury
HolyFury.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak and 2 Frail.

ItsSmitingTime.NAME: It's Smitin' Time!
ItsSmitingTime.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! for each Smite card in your hand.

ZealousPersecution.NAME: Zealous Persecution
ZealousPersecution.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have a card in your hand that costs 3 or more. NL Draw !M! cards. Lose 6 life.

OverwhelmingLight.NAME: Overwhelming Light
OverwhelmingLight.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! weak to ALL enemies. Draw a card.

Vindication.NAME: Vindication
Vindication.DESCRIPTION: Apply 10 Frail. NL. If the enemy is less than half health, gain !M! Spirit. Exhaust.

Radiance.NAME: Radiance
Radiance.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

BraceThePain.NAME: Brace the Pain
BraceThePain.DESCRIPTION: For each 8 HP you lost, gain !M! Block.

SeekAnswers.NAME: Seek Answers
SeekAnswers.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. If it costs !M! Or more, gain [R]

Meaballize.NAME: Meaballize
Meaballize.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. You start your next turn with 1 less energy. Exhaust.

CombatStance.NAME: Combat Stance
CombatStance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy deals damage to you next turn, apply !M! Frail and Weak.

DualSpirit.NAME: Dual Spirit
DualSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Put a copy of a skill or power card to your hand.
DualSpirit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! copies of a skill or power card to your hand.

Cleanse.NAME: Cleanse
Cleanse.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Weak, Vulnerable and Frail.
Cleanse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove all Weak, Vulnerable and Frail. Exhaust all Statuses and Curses in your hand.

ZealousAmbition.NAME: Zealous Ambition
ZealousAmbition.DESCRIPTION: If you have over half your HP, Lose 8 HP and draw 3 cards. If you have less, Discard 2 cards and heal !M! HP. Exhaust

Charge.NAME: Charge
Charge.DESCRIPTION: The next Attack you play deals 50% more damage. Lose !M! HP. Exhaust.
Charge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next Attack you play deals 50% more damage. Lose !M! HP.

Zen.NAME: Zen
Zen.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP from a card, gain 1 Dexterity.

MightForm.NAME: Might Form
MightForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs 3 or more, gain !M! Block.

Sharpen.NAME: Sharpen
Sharpen.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, upgrade an Attack card in your hand. If you can't, lose 3 HP.
Sharpen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. At the end of each turn, upgrade an Attack card in your hand. If you can't, lose 2 HP.

TurnTables.NAME: Turn Tables
TurnTables.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply Frail to an enemy, lose 4 HP and gain [R].

PushOnward.NAME: Push Onward
PushOnward.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you lose HP from a card, Exhaust a random card from your hand and gain 2 HP.

InsightfulPrayer.NAME: Insightful Prayer
InsightfulPrayer.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Whenever you heal, if you're above 60% HP, draw a card.
InsightfulPrayer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Whenever you heal, if you're above 60% HP, draw !M! cards.

DelvingPrayer.NAME: Delving Prayer
DelvingPrayer.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of each turn, draw a card and Exhaust the top card of your draw pile.
DelvingPrayer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of each turn, draw !M! cards and Exhaust the top !M! cards of your draw pile.

GrandHealing.NAME: Grand Healing
GrandHealing.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M!% of your max HP. Exhaust.

AtAllCosts.NAME: At All Costs
AtAllCosts.DESCRIPTION: Choose and add a card from your Draw Pile to your hand. Add a random Curse to your hand. Exhaust.
AtAllCosts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose and add a card from your Draw Pile to your hand. Add a random Curse to your hand. Exhaust.
